message.body: I hope I see people playing that on the bus
The maker of this told me he was making a fourth game like a year ago, I wonder if he's still on it...
You're remembering the memorial games. Three.
I believe it is Dive Man
felony and battery A tier or whatever
what the hell topped the addiction tier list
alright jarpig fans, which is this character from
He's known just for making this series and by known I mean just by me and the legends pretty much
ah I see, I like games with this old style
I remember the bosses in this being a lot easier and better yeah
I hope to catch you more properly later, hope the game is good
these are angels killing you, what a deep meaning
know too many folks who thinks 16c is still reasonable somehow
yeah thats what I mean too
Is she secretly a frost elemental or something
this is still right though atleast I think
You've never burned static electricity away?
oh hold on fire and electric is neutral, but electric IS super to water
hell given how strong fire is that would make it too busted
how goes it for the legends of saturday?
why are you fighting a mum
she's a mum, i can see that portrait
she probably fights with a ladel
i slept amazing and got like 9 hours of sleep so today is pretty swell
the character moving around is irrelevant to her
this girl is from Blue Breaker apparently
Well yeah, she's not the one getting broken
shes out to break the blues
He'll get it right in Remember the Memorial Games IV
atleast hes trying to make a real fangame these days
a few years in the perpetual stew and he'll come out fully cooked
all good cooks experiment at some point
maggot slop wasnt built in a day
banana stew is a thing though and it tastes good
a banana sundae is kinda like a stew
like sheesh this looks pretty decent
alright, you got me Canus. It could be good
that stage win jingle is really familiar
except it's the full mappy song there
its the mappy stage clear jingle
honestly maybe mappy is your visitor nal
He's gonna be having fun for a while Mr. Ing
are the secrets just whole stages like that
man im still looking at the pokemon wiki and I did not know they added a new type this generation
"Unlike other types, no Pok√©mon or moves bear it naturally, and it is exclusive to Terastallized Pok√©mon." -Bulbpedia
I guess its probably a 1 game gimmick and theyll kill it next type
so I've heard of "mega pokemon" and now there are apparently "tera pokemon"?
so if a pokemon goes sicko crystal mode, tera type moves become super effective
they need to just do the pokemon mmo already and make their money and call it a day
Yeah they basically keep repackaging mega evolutions as a new thing every generation
itll have players, make them rich,and theyll get to stop giving af about making these games over and over
what was the shield sword shit called
that being said, stellar type moves are also super effective against the stellar type itself, like dragon
gigantamax?? okay thats a raw name
it kinda sounds like the sun and moon gimmick
with the uh X moves or whatever
huh didnt think pokemon was a wolfie thing
they really never brought the sun moon stuff back lol
This sounds like ripoff kirby music

Theres always sirens from your mic
Yurooko subscribed with Prime. They've subscribed for 27 months, currently on a 2 month streak! Merry Christmas! glhf legends

they were recording audio from a youtube video and they slid the volume up during the recording

Dont you wanna know what your taxes are going to?

thought these were the Charr blocks for a second

oh shit its this song from needle hell

oh this is actually by the guy

maybe it heals the others when you kill one
I assume health just refreshes between phases

that last attack should be like in the middle of this lol
looks like every other bounce is an aimed one
so they do one "normal" bounce, then aim at you
not sure it's just visual, I think it also locks you in place

im a lil surprised there was no flip
there's no shot this is a boss rush, right
this is like the second half of the game length

this is literally a mini avoidance
